definition: variant of 小兒麻痺|小儿麻痹/infantile paralysis/polio (poliomyelitis)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: The classic example, of course, is PolioPlus.
sentences.chinese: 根除小儿痲痹等疾病计划就是典型的例子。

sentences.english: What can you do as governor to continue to support the goal of polio eradication?
sentences.chinese: 你作为总监应如何继续支持根除小儿痲痹的目标？
